snippet.title: SNES Super Metroid Introduction
snippet.description: Simply put, one of the best videogames ever made. How nostalgic I get when I hear those first few lines of speech... I bought this game the day it came out in Portugal, and I was simply hooked. If there ever was a prize for "Perfect Videogame", Super Metroid for the Super Nintendo would be in the top 10 of such list. Enjoy the intro...
